title: Problems with connection and leavebusters
body: I was in a draft queue and I got a game but as i was choosing a champ my client crashed. After i reconnected i got a 5 minute leave buster.

replies.body:
When an account has a trend of disconnections, a low priority queue is applied to the account. This is because regardless of intent, disconnections negatively impact everyone in a match. 

Most issues with crashes in champ select are caused by a poor connection to the servers. While there are numerous causes that could be at play, our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) addresses the most frequent solutions.

If you should still see issues in champ select after working through that guide, please let me know.
